content: {"locationId": "5935", "organizationId": "5053", "name": "Deer Valley Unified School District", "address1": "18440 N 15th Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Phoenix", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "85023", "country": null, "phone": "602-467-6103", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.65239", "longitude": "-112.09271", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Deer Valley School District", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Food Pantry is located on the campus of Constitution Elementary School which is located on 15th Ave. just south of Union Hills Drive.  The pantry is on the east side of the school in a fenced alcove just south of the Administrative Office, next door to the WIC office.  ", "notes": "", "contactName": "Yadira Martinez", "contactPhone": "602-467-6103", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Monday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM", "Tuesday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM [ 3rd week(s)]", "Wednesday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM", "Thursday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM", "Friday 8:00 AM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
